title: RedisBungee跨服问题
author: HJ_KISS
txt_content:
RedisBC连接另一台BC服时出错..
附:我的Redis连接成功，其他BC服已配置...

主BC报错如下:
 
23:51:10 [严重] [CloudDream] <-> DownstreamBridge <-> [RPGSurvival] - encountered exception
java.lang.IllegalStateException: Cannot connect proxy to itself!

replies.author: lvsihan
replies.txt_content: redis跨服是用什么插件实现的..
